trans-unit.source: Note: all configuration files are in JSON format, but allow hash (#) comments.
trans-unit.target: Note: all configuration files are in JSON format, but allow hash (#) comments.

trans-unit.source: Note: protocols pop / pops not available yet.
trans-unit.target: Note: protocols pop / pops not available yet.

trans-unit.source: Note: the IMAP server only works with Evolution so far. Thunderbird and Geary still can’t retrieve messages correctly.
trans-unit.target: Note: the IMAP server only works with Evolution so far. Thunderbird and Geary still can’t retrieve messages correctly.

trans-unit.source: Note: this is alpha software, use it only if willing to help debug it.
trans-unit.target: Note: this is alpha software, use it only if willing to help debug it.

trans-unit.source: > forwards the email to an external mail delivery agent, or to another mail server if a mail address is specified; if the last argument is a sha256 hashed passphrase, the user can relay messages using the mail address as username
trans-unit.target: > forwards the email to an external mail delivery agent, or to another mail server if a mail address is specified; if the last argument is a sha256 hashed passphrase, the user can relay messages using the mail address as username

trans-unit.source: - disables the service to the user
trans-unit.target: - disables the service to the user

trans-unit.source: . delivers the message to a Phen plugin; the mail plugin itself replies messages with an aknowledgment echo
trans-unit.target: . delivers the message to a Phen plugin; the mail plugin itself replies messages with an aknowledgment echo

trans-unit.source: / indicates the path to the mail folder, where the user can specify preferences in the
trans-unit.target: / indicates the path to the mail folder, where the user can specify preferences in the

trans-unit.source: : specifies an alias to another username (with @domain if not the same)
trans-unit.target: : specifies an alias to another username (with @domain if not the same)

trans-unit.source: Gateway for using Phen’s internal messaging mechanism
trans-unit.target: Gateway for using Phen’s internal messaging mechanism

trans-unit.source: Identities that don’t belong to the admin account must have admin authorization to use the host system’s resources, such as using and external MDA or executing a code filter.
trans-unit.target: Identities that don’t belong to the admin account must have admin authorization to use the host system’s resources, such as using and external MDA or executing a code filter.
Поиск по ключевым словам с помощью Woosh.

trans-unit.source: Other plugins can easily send mail using the
trans-unit.target: Другие плагины могут легко отправлять почту,используя

trans-unit.source: Remember that mail servers are required by RFC822 6.3, RFC1123 5.2.7, and RFC2821 4.5.1 to have a valid
trans-unit.target: Помните,что почтовые серверы должны соответствовать требованиям RFC822 6.3,RFC1123 5.2.7 и RFC2821 4.5.1,чтобы иметь действующий

trans-unit.source: The POP implementation requires the unhashed storage of the passphrase, so to avoid using clear-text you can use the shell command
trans-unit.target: Реализация POP требует неразборчивого хранения ключевой фразы,поэтому,чтобы избежать использования чистого текста,вы можете использовать команду командной строки оболочки

trans-unit.source: The first character of the user definition string sets the action to take when receiving or relaying mails:
trans-unit.target: Первый символ пользовательской строки определения задает действие,которое необходимо выполнить при получении или пересылке почты:

trans-unit.source: The passphrase is used for SMTP and IMAP authentication, and its hash can be calculated with Phen’s shell command
trans-unit.target: The passphrase is used for SMTP and IMAP authentication, and its hash can be calculated with Phen’s shell command

trans-unit.source: This plugin provides full mail services:
trans-unit.target: Этот плагин обеспечивает полное почтовое обслуживание:

trans-unit.source: When used in conjunction with Phen’s DNS plugin, outgoing mail passes common anti-spam tests. The module dkimpy (python-dkim in Debian) is required for DKIM signatures.
trans-unit.target: When used in conjunction with Phen’s DNS plugin, outgoing mail passes common anti-spam tests. The module dkimpy (python-dkim in Debian) is required for DKIM signatures.

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify configuration sections if you want to change a default value. For instance, the
trans-unit.target: Вы должны указать разделы конфигурации только в том случае,если хотите изменить значение по умолчанию.Например

trans-unit.source: access: serves messages through IMAP4, POP3, or direct shell management
trans-unit.target: доступ:обслуживает сообщения через IMAP4,POP3 или прямое управление оболочкой.

trans-unit.source: address, and by RFC2142 Section 2 to have a valid
trans-unit.target: адрес,и по RFC2142 раздел 2,чтобы иметь действительный

trans-unit.source: better user documentation (some features are not currently described)
trans-unit.target: улучшенная пользовательская документация (некоторые функции в настоящее время не описаны)

trans-unit.source: continous fetching through IMAP (don’t disconnect, go IDLEing)
trans-unit.target: continous fetching through IMAP (don’t disconnect, go IDLEing)

trans-unit.source: delivery: receives and filters messages, then delivers them to Phen mailboxes, to other plugins, or to external agents (e.g. dovecot LDA)
trans-unit.target: доставка:получает и фильтрует сообщения,затем доставляет их на почтовые ящики Phen,на другие плагины или внешним агентам (например,dovecot LDA).

trans-unit.source: fetching: retrieves messages from other servers
optimizations (lots of room for improvement here)
relay through smarthost: forwards the messages to the configured SMTP server to do the relaying
trans-unit.target: ретрансляция через smarthost:пересылка сообщений на сконфигурированный SMTP-сервер для выполнения ретрансляции

trans-unit.source: relay: signs mail messages (DKIM) and transports them to other servers
trans-unit.target: реле:подписывает почтовые сообщения (DKIM)и транспортирует их на другие серверы.
